title: Week 10 Day 5 - Frontend Project
description: Advanced frontend project showcasing modern React patterns and responsive design.
longDescription: A comprehensive frontend application built with Next.js and React, demonstrating advanced concepts including state management, API integration, and responsive UI design with modern best practices.
problem: Create a modern, responsive frontend application demonstrating proficiency in React and Next.js.
solution: Built a feature-rich web application with clean code architecture and optimal performance.

title: Week 10 Day 3 - Frontend Project
description: Interactive web application with modern UI components and seamless user experience.
longDescription: A dynamic frontend project focusing on creating interactive user interfaces with React and implementing modern design patterns for enhanced user experience.
problem: Develop an interactive web interface with smooth user interactions and modern design.
solution: Created a responsive application with intuitive UI components and optimized performance.

title: Week 12 Day 5 - Full Stack Project
description: Full-stack application demonstrating backend integration and data management.
longDescription: A complete full-stack application built with modern technologies, featuring both frontend and backend components with database integration and API development.
problem: Build a complete full-stack solution with frontend, backend, and data persistence.
solution: Developed an end-to-end application with RESTful APIs and modern frontend architecture.

title: Week 6 - Frontend Foundation
description: Foundational frontend project focusing on core web development skills.
longDescription: An early-stage frontend project demonstrating proficiency in fundamental web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with modern development practices.
problem: Master fundamental web development concepts and create a responsive website.
solution: Built a clean, responsive website demonstrating core frontend development skills.
